attributes.action: Recognition for Key Workers during COVID 19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: They have shown how much the UK depends on these workers and they deserve our respect and better living overall.
attributes.background: I would like them to receive a pay rise, better working hours and benefits.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one of these petitions:

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619
Pay bonus to all key workers:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
A medal to honour the fortitude of people working in essential occupations:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308035

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
